doc.description:
Common part for all IMUs.
This takes the IMU_GYRO_RAW, IMU_ACCEL_RAW and IMU_MAG_RAW ABI messages as input.

define.name: INTEGRATION
define.description: Enable gyro/accel integration calculations (enabled for the ekf2)

define.name: GYRO_CALIB
define.description: Gyroscope calibration structures list (see struct imu_gyro_t)

define.name: ACCEL_CALIB
define.description: Accelerometer calibration structures list (see struct imu_accel_t)

define.name: MAG_CALIB
define.description: Magnetometer calibration structures list (see struct imu_mag_t)

define.name: GYRO_ABI_SEND_ID
define.description: The gyro ABI ID which is send over telemetry/logging

define.name: ACCEL_ABI_SEND_ID
define.description: The accel ABI ID which is send over telemetry/logging

define.name: MAG_ABI_SEND_ID
define.description: The mag ABI ID which is send over telemetry/logging

define.name: LOG_HIGHSPEED
define.description: Log all the accel/gyro measurements at the IMU sampling rates in floats

define.name: LOG_HIGHSPEED_DEVICE
define.description: The device to log all the highspeeds measurements
